commits.subject: Merge pull request #20 from devmade-ai/claude/fix-overflow-issue-cN5Xw
commits.body: Fix color picker overflow on mobile

commits.subject: Fix color picker overflow on mobile
commits.body:
Split color and size controls onto separate rows in TextEditor.
Restructured text element rows in LayoutSelector Placement tab
to put color picker on its own row with flex-wrap for mobile.

commits.subject: Merge pull request #19 from devmade-ai/claude/add-neutral-colors-369vk
commits.body: Add neutral colors for text and overlays

commits.subject: Add neutral colors for text and overlays
commits.body:
Add 6 neutral color options (off-black, dark gray, gray, light gray,
off-white, white) available in all color pickers regardless of theme.

- Define neutralColors array and getNeutralColor() helper in themes.js
- Update TextEditor, ImageUploader, and LayoutSelector color pickers
- Update AdCanvas resolveColor() to handle neutral color keys

commits.subject: Improve grayscale control with slider and preset independence
commits.body:
- Change grayscale from boolean to percentage (0-100%)
- Add quick toggle in Settings section (On/Off)
- Add fine-tune slider in Filters section (0-100%)
- Presets no longer override user's grayscale setting
- Update all preset configs to use numeric values

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: Add horizontal position control for images
commits.body:
- Change imagePosition from string to object with vertical/horizontal
- Add horizontal position control (left, center, right) in Image tab
- Combine both values for CSS background-position

Useful for controlling which part of image is visible when cropped in cover mode.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: Update documentation structure
commits.body:
- Move completed items from TODO.md to HISTORY.md
- Add HISTORY.md section to CLAUDE.md documentation guidelines
- Keep TODO.md focused on pending items only

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: Replace sample images with new landscape images
commits.body:
- Removed 9 old square sample images
- Added 10 new landscape images (1.5 aspect ratio)
- Renamed files to simple sample-01 through sample-10 format
- Updated config with new filenames and aspect ratios

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>

commits.subject: Add contextual micro-tips to overlay controls
commits.body:
Tips appear in Image tab (Filters + Overlay sections) and Layout â†’ Overlay tab,
providing real-time guidance based on current settings:
- Overlay type-specific advice (solid, gradient, vignette)
- Opacity range recommendations (low/mid/high)
- Grayscale + overlay duotone technique hint
- Blur usage tip for text legibility

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
